COVID-19疫苗可能会降低长期相互兴趣的风险尽管需要更多的研究，尤其是对于儿童和免疫功能低下的群体，但FOUL COVID-19-19可能会使COVID-19条件后的风险降低27％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/covid-19-vaccines-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-covid.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/covid-19-vaccines-may-cut-cut-cut-cut-cut-covid.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=917EBC4B-C416-4E59-B4A2-0A2-0A90F5C2AE99 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 07:30:00 -0400 COVID-19 Vaccines May Cut Risk of Long COVID

在任何年龄段的任何形式上行使脑力无论是清晨的慢跑，还是Tai Chi的触感，南澳大利亚大学的开创性研究表明，任何形式的运动都可以显着增强儿童，成人和老年人的大脑功能和记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/Exercise-of-any-kind-boosts-boosts-brainpower-at-at-at-any-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/Exercise-of-any-kind-boosts-boosts-broainpoper-apoppower-at-at-any-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d7082d2-11d5-47CA-A084-CA29DC2A75FC Wed, 26 Mar 2025 05:41:00 -0400 Exercise of any kind boosts brainpower at any age
微针在临床前模型中加速糖尿病伤口愈合糖尿病伤口通常导致严重的并发症，可能导致截肢。这些慢性和非愈合的伤口以持续的炎症为特征，影响了全球人口的6％以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/microneedles-accelerate-diabetrate-diabetrate-wound-healing-healing-healing-in-preclinical-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/microneedles-accelerate-diabetrate-diabetrate-wound-healing-healing-nealing-in-in-preclinical-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2cc555af0-a15c-43e2-842d-b69ddc6a0453 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 02:18:20 -0400 Microneedles accelerate diabetic wound healing in preclinical models
Cedars-Sinai研究表明，通过细胞疗法快速治愈心脏损伤根据Cedars-Sinai Smidt Heart Institute的一项新研究，一种迅速增加人体产生抗炎细胞的科学技术促进了心脏病发作的愈合。一旦适应治疗人类，该技术可能会在心脏病发作后修复心肌损害，并应用于多种炎症性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/cedars-sinai-sinai-sinai-shows-shows-nows-healing-healing-healing-u------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/cedars-sinai-sinai-sinai-shows-shows-rapid-healing-healing-of-heart-damage-with-with-cell-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf80c308-01b2-467e-9d11-6fe766d40a34 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 02:00:30 -0400 Cedars-Sinai study shows rapid healing of heart damage with cell therapy
解决急诊医学中的错误学术急诊医学（AEM）是由同行评审的学术急诊医学协会（SAEM）杂志发表的，它发表了针对急诊室中错误主题的三月问题，并非常重视诊断错误。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/addressing-errors-in-erors-in-emergency-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/addressing-errors-in-erors-in-emergency-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7543dddd-6c54-4e15-bf87-99a27272ab405d Wed, 26 Mar 2025 01:45:20 -0400 Addressing errors in emergency medicine
新准则建议为产后妇女进行2小时的每周运动专家在《英国运动医学杂志》发表的一项新指南中说，应强烈鼓励新妈妈开始至少在至少两个小时的中度至剧烈的体育锻炼中，例如在出生后的头三个月，每周都会进行锻炼，以改善健康和福祉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/new-guidelines-recommend-2-hours-weekly-comply-eccise-for postpartpartum-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/new-guidelines-recommend-2-hours-2-hours-weekly-eccise-for postpartpartpartum-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A751F0A7-42EA-4267-A0F1-C0DF3D803087 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 01:34:34 -0400 New guidelines recommend 2 hours of weekly exercise for postpartum women
研究开发了融合的神经器官，并用瘦素发展一项在同行评审的期刊干细胞和发育中的一项新研究描述了由人类诱导的多能干细胞（IPSC）与荧光标记的脑膜的胎儿瘦素融合的神经器官的共同培养系统的发展，称为荧光标记的脑膜，称为脑膜粘膜，称为Lmno lmno（Lmno）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-develops-fuse--neur-neur-naroids-with-leptomeninges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/study-develops-fused-fuse--neural-erganoids-with-leptomeninges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0920037-4729-4729-4e8888-888f-30b10b1b1b6b677e3 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 01:23:39 -0400 Study develops fused neural organoids with leptomeninges
心脏结构变化及其对器官功能的影响宣布了有关心血管创新和应用杂志的新文章出版物。心脏是人类循环系统的中心器官。先天性和获得的心脏结构变化都会导致影响包括大脑在内的各种器官功能的血液动力学改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/heart-sonstruce-changes-and-their-their-impact-on-organ-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/heart-scrupture-changes-and-their-their-impact-on-organ-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc7b9c2c-9182-4919-a9ff-4078eb7d0ec2 Wed, 26 Mar 2025 00:59:53 -0400 Heart structure changes and their impact on organ function
